Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bracelet
Description: Circular bracelet in the shape of a ring, cut from a large shell. The edges and the rounded exterior surface were carefully polished, but the spirals and the mother-of-pearl were left unpolished on the interior surface. This very simple piece of jewellery bears all the characteristics of numerous bracelets made from ivory, bone and shells worn by C-Group people.
